1.content:
may walked downstairs after searching thru the internet for some info for a history project that she had to have done in a week. Having little luck she decided to take a break and make a little snack. As she walked down the hallway to the kitchen she couldnt help but look at herself in a mirror hanging on the wall. May looked just as lovely as any other 18 year old girl, But the first thing she'd always notice about herself was her height. for being an asian girl she was a little tall. around 5'11. Tho it never bothered her, she'd sometimes feel a little embarrased hanging out with her friends who were all no bigger than 5'6 in height. May turned her face away from the mirror then continued on her way into the kitchen. As she looked thru the cabinets for anything good to eat, the doorbell rang.

"I wonder who that could be?" May said then walked over to the door and anwsered it.

"Good evening ma'am. Are you May Shirashi?" The delivery guy asked.

"Yes I am." May replied back. The delivery guy then had May sign her name on a sheet and handed her a square package.

"Thanks." May smiled then shut the door.

May walked back into the kitchen and set the package on the counter. She then grabbed a knife from the drawer and began cutting the tape off the edges of the box. However when she opened the package up she saw that it wasnt that CD she had ordered on ebay, but instead she got some bizarre looking toy gun!

"What? I didnt order this! What is this thing anyways?!" May then took the item out of the box. She began examining the strange gun a little,trying to figure out what it was. It looked like one of those laser pistols they would use on some sci-fi movie to her. May dug thru the styrofoam peanuts in the box some more and pulled out a piece of paper which was an instruction manual. She began reading thru it and laughed a little.

"What? A shrink gun? Oh come on already!" May then crumbled the paper in her hand and threw it away.

"Like if I really shot at the chair over there, it would shrink?" May said then pointed the gun at the chair by the dining table and pulled the trigger. Just then a bright blue beam discharged from the barrel and hit the chair, engulfing it in a blue aura! May jumped back a little and dropped the gun, much surprised at what had just happened!

"Did it just really??" May said then slowly walked over to the spot were the chair once stood. She then slowly kneeled down and picked up the now very tiny chair in her hand.

"Amazing....it actually does work!" May then walked back over to the gun and picked it up. Just then a bunch of ideas began running thru her mind now. She just couldnt help but shrink more stuff with the gun! Making up her mind, may-

The voice behind her made May jump. She turned around and saw Jimmy, a guy who lived nearby who was always staring at her. She knew he liked her, but she dispised him and didn't even acknowledge him at all... until now. He was over weight and not very bright, but for the first time he now had a use for her. Being a smart girl, she quickly thought of plausible excuses.

"Oh hey Jim", she said with a cute smile. "Sorry, I seem to have trodden on a bug, it's all over my sock". She knew Jim would be too slow to realise that she hadn't walked out of the house without shoes on as her black flats were on the floor next to her feet. Jim started to mumble something but before he got a chance to say something legible, may quickly interrupted "Jim as you are here, could just bend down and take this sock off my foot, I don't really want to touch all the bug guts". Although this was a very odd request, Jim didn't think twice about accepting. He couldn't believe a girl as hot as this was asking him to get this close to her. With a stuttered agreement, he accepted and bend down to her feet, probably too quickly. He removed her sock, trying to do it in such a way that he got to touch her bare foot as much as possible without raising suspicions. It felt soft to the touch, and he got several wiffs of a strawberry scented perfume. He tried his very best to hide the fact that he was really turned on by doing this.

She giggled slightly as his hands tickled her sensitive sole. As soon as the first sock was off, he did the other one without being asked. May watched him with her head cocked to one side, smiling.

Her foot slipped on his neck slightly, causing her patterned sole to rip painfully across the skin and Jim to yelp in agony.

1131211.content:
"Okay, this is the deal", Sophie said to Tommy. "May and myself are going to put our shoes on our feet and blindfold ourselves. You are going to wear a bell and try and run away from us and we are going to try and pin you under one of our feet. The other rule is, you have to keep on moving, so the bell keeps ringing. If it stops ringing for more than a couple of seconds, we know you have either removed the bell or are standing still. If you do either of these, we get to play the game with blindfolds off. Do you understand?"

Tommy was too nervous to speak ar first. He knew he was not in a position to argue, and he didn't like the sound of "pin you under one of our feet". He watched May slipping on her sandals, her toes wiggling in anticipation and Sophie slipping on her ballet flats. He wished they were not going to use their shoes... both their soles of their feet were very smooth, he knew because he had just been pressed against the bare foot of both of them. However, he was sure the soles of their shoes were hard and cold, regardless of how soft and warm the feet within them were. Sophie obviously noticed the fear in his face and said "don't worry, we'll TRY not to squish you too much" with a slight giggle.

They took the bell off the collar of family cat and used some string to tie it firmly around his waist. They then both covered their eyes with their hands as "blindfolds", which Tommy was sure wasn't fair as they could easily look at any time, but he wasn't about to voice that now.

May gave him five seconds head start, so he ran as fast as he could away from the feet of the teenage girls. Soon the girls started to move, the ringing bell giving them his rough location. Tommy knew he'd been set up, there was no way he could possibly win this game. It may take a few minutes, but they'd get him eventually and judging by the force they were pressing their feet down into the floor when they thought they were stepping on him, he would end up crippled for life, if not killed. He knew he had only one option. Take the bell off and run for the door. As he was running, he pulled at the string around his waist with all his strength and it came loose and landed, with the bell, on the floor. He ran faster than he had ever run before under the couch towards the door, but before he'd even made it half way, he heard May shouting "he has taken the bell off, quick". Tommy was almost to the end of the couch, right by the open door when Sophies head appeared in front of him, she was looking under the couch, her brown eyes staring at him with annoyance. Her eyes lightened up when she saw him. "He is under the couch" she giggled at May. A few seconds later, something hard hit his back and knocked him to the floor. He looked up to see Mays leg extended under the couch, the patterned sole of her sandal coming down on top of him. He didn't have time to move before it hit him and knocked the wind out of him.

May dragged her foot back, feeling Tommy's body rolling under her foot against the sole of her sandal. She eventually managed to drag him out from under the couch. He was in a pretty bad state. Being dragged between the sole of her shoe and the carpet had caused major friction burns across his body and appeared to have broken several bones in the process, though he was still alive and very aware of the pain. Sophie and May looked down at him between their feet. "Ummm, I think we should probably kill him, we can't have any fun with him like this, we can find someone else" May said with disgust, like she was talking about a half squashed slug. "Okay, but we need to take him outside, otherwise we'll get blood over the carpet" Sohpie laughed, while picking him up by a leg and carrying him to the back yard. Once outside she placed him on the grass and lowered her foot onto him, pressing him gently into the ground. Sophie stood with all her weight on him before removing her foot to see the results. "Dammit, he is still moving" she said angrily. "I must have just pressed him into the soft grass". May then placed her sandaled foot on top of him and twisted slowly from side to side, ripping his body apart, her toes pressing hard onto her victim beneath them, before dragging her foot back. "See", she said happily, "works every time".

"He's moving," a loud squealing voice pierced the man's ears. He opend his eyes and looked up in horror at the two giant faces staring down at him; two Asian girls one a teenager the other a child.

It had to be just some crazy dream. He would wake up soon and it would be all over, he thought to himself.

"Can I hold him?"

"He's very special and very delicate. I don't want you to break him."

The man tried to stand up in her open palm but May poked him with the tip of her finger and he fell back down in her palm. She held him down on her palm with the tip of her finger.

Both girls laughed as he struggled helplessly to get up.

"Please, I'll be very careful with him please."

"Okay, but don't hold him to tightly, you'll hurt him."

May dropped the tiny person in her sister's open hand. The girl's fingers tightend around him holding him firmly. He tried to squirm free but the girl held him tightly with his arms pinned to his side.

"Does Mom and Dad know," the little girl asked her sister.

"No and we can't tell them about him. They may not let us keep him if they find out."

"But why?"

"He's a real person, Just small."

"Look, I promise I won't tell anyone what you have done if you return me to my normal size now. You girls could get in a lot of trouble. This is kidnapping."

Both girls laughed at the heigh pitced squeaks the little man made as he pleaded with them.

"This is my little sister Lisa. You have to do obey her too."

"He would have to obey Ken and Barbie as well. Even they are much bigger than him."

He just stood there. Anything he did at his tiny size would be a source for their amusement. He felt humilitated and defeated. He would do what they said knowing that he really had no choice. He tried to remain calm. He was still a man and when the time was right he would try to escape.

"Let's let him rest now. We'll need to hide him so that Mom and Dad don't find him," May told her sister.

May reached in her closet and grabbed one of her knee high leather boots. She placed it on its side on the floor with the opening near the tiny man.

"This will have to do now. Go on...Get inside."

It had been an eventful afternoon for Sara so far. The middle-aged Chinese woman had come home from work and found the most amazing device lying on the table. She's finally put the obnoxious neighborhood brat in his place, and found an entirely new sensation completely unknown to her before. Sara's slightly chubby frame indicated that she had poor impulse control when it came to things that tasted good, and she fully intended to have her fill of tiny people.

But as she considered her next move, practical concerns took over. She needed a way to have a lot of tiny people at once; picking them off one by one was too much effort for such a tiny snack. And she was far too vulnerable if someone tried to stop her; she was still a shorter-than-average woman.

Unless...

The shrinking ray clearly had a restoration function; Sara wondered what would happen if she used that function on herself? Worst case scenario, nothing. Best case scenario...

Without hesitating another moment, she changed the ray's polarity and shot herself squarely in the chest. The reaction was immediate; Sara began to grow, expanding higher and higher into the air, an awestruck look on her face. The Chinese woman's shocked expression became one of pure malevolent glee as she realized the possibilities this offered her.

Still wearing her business suit and skirt, but missing her panties as part of her early games with Steven, Sara grew still larger, towering over the tranquil suburb. She stopped as she reached the proportions she expected; full-sized people seemed to be the same inch high that tiny people were.

Sara's stomach growled ravenously; she still hadn't had dinner. And she knew exactly where she'd go to enjoy her first giant meal: her law firm. She resented her work, considering herself under-appreciated and ignored by the higher-ups in the company, and thwarted by the incompetence of her subordinates. May had put the shrink gun on a little table in the big garden behind her house.
The next day was Sunday, so May and her sister Lucy were home, but their parents had to go away for a congress. At 9 o'clock Lucy was already awake so she went to the garden and found the gun. While Lucy was looking at that strange thing pointing at herself, she accidentally pulled the trigger and shrunk until she was about 1/4 inches tall! She looked around in panic, seeing the grass towering above her...
At 9:30 May got up. Since it was pretty hot, she put a short-sleeved vest and short panties and she didn't put shoes, socks or flip-flops, she decided to walk barefoot all the day. After breakfast, she went to the garden.
Lucy was sitting at the shadow of a mushroom, wondering what to do, when suddenly she heard huge thuds getting near to her: footsteps! Lucy looked up and saw the immense figure of her gigantic sister towering above her. May lifted up a huge bare foot and Lucy realized she was going to step right on her! The little girl ran away, while the giantess crushed the mushroom under her gigantic foot.
May wasn't absolutely realizing she could kill her sister, she was enjoying the tickling and fresh grass being crushed under her soft bare feet. She also giggled a little when she stepped on the mushroom, amused by that delicate thing under her smooth sole.

1341.content:
Whilst May very well could have been quite ecstatic, and very impatient to try her new device right away. She did have other plans, some of which she had been formulating the night prior. So that once she was awake and dressed, she would be off to make them a reality, and the word on today's agenda was revenge. May was the subject, like most of the school to the whims of a Bully, May especially as this particular bully seemed to fancy her a bit. Trish Pierce, the local delinquent and punk which the school only murmur about and who makes the lives of those around her a living hell. The only reprieve which May got was the thin ice that Trish had put herself on with the Principle.

The amount of brawls, and broken bones she has caused amongst the other students, leading to her being escorted off the premises in handcuffs more than a few times. The Principle would have enough simply give Trish a choice, behave or be expelled.The Punk having been held back a year already, wouldn't want this, and it would be a good reason why she's been a bit more tolerable. Though May did fear the day that her violent temper would give in, and she could only hope it wasn't after another of the numerous advances that was made on her.

That was all over today however, May was going to finally put her mind at ease, and Trish in her place. For the first time, Trish was going to be humbled. She almost couldn't help her excitement. Having spent the morning continuing her plotting, making sure her attire was just right for when she did this. She wanted the vision that Trish would awake too would be the visage of May as a Goddess. The only unfortunate thing for her in all her plotting, this would make her late. She showing up to school a good ten minutes after the bell had rang.

Her walk, it would be a disappointment for her, having to wait for the day to go on until she could get a chance at her target. Would she even show up today, it was another thought which made her mind race. Trish's attendance has been a been flaky recently, it was certainly possible that she would blow off school again! Fortunately, a sigh of relief would overtake May as her eyes settled upon the fronts door, more importantly the staircase that led up to them. Almost as if fate itself wanted this to happen, sitting nicely placed upon those stairs say just who she wanted to see.

From what May could see, Trish was looking as.....fashionable as ever. Sitting there in an attire of all black clothing, a tight fitting t-shirt with a decal on the front dedicated to her favorite band. A pair of black pants which hugged to her slender yet toned frame, they worn down, showing they have indeed seen better days. Her signature and equally beaten up DC with the letters respectively on the side, if a bit faded from the years of use these skater shoes have given her. To round it out would be her leather jacket she wore. of course, May couldn't ignore that other things about her, the moderately short hair of hers, shaved on one side, and swept to the other. Her piercing green eyes which she had seen staring back at her coldly more than once, oh it definitely was her.

May couldn't help but gleam as she looked on, her footsteps approaching to the unaware Trish. She sitting there and enjoying a cigarette as her phone sat on the cold concrete of the steps next to her, blaring a song from possibly the band on her shirt. The heavy and melodic tunes of Death Metal able to be heard as she lazily sat there, dead set on finishing her smoke before she went to go sleep through her first class. It wouldn't be long before her eyes met the approaching May, and an all too familiar grin would form on her lips. "Isn't that something?" Trish would mutter to herself, her words a bit off due to her cigarette hanging loosely from her lips. Picking up her phone, she would begin to make her way for her prey.

"nice and easy May.....nice and easy." The asian girl would have to reassure herself as she stepped closer. Her heart beating faster and faster the closer Trish got to her. Now far past nervous as her feared enemy was making her way for her. It wouldn't be long before Trish was just a short few feet away from her, and May's hand behind her back, fingers twitching on the trigger of the gun was ready to go. "Well, isn't it a beautiful fuckin' day, my little May? Well you know the drill, if you want to get to class, you're goin' to have to pay your respects as always." The tone of Trish's voice, so cold and nearly disinterested, it caused a chill to be sent up May's spine, as her last breath left her shaking. Now within arms reach she couldn't back out now. She had cranked the settings way up, intending on making Trish a microbe as she drew the device!

134132.content:
Inside the building, the day was going on like any other day, middle of the week mundane routines. Students all ready sick of their studies and looking forward to what they would do once it was let out. Many could be found yawning and looking on bored as they were barely into their first period classes when a bright flash overtook the building. Blinding everyone inside, it was as if the sun itself had decided to say hello just outside each window. Many students screamed out in shock, falling from their desks or sliding their books to the side in a panic. The luckier ones didn't react at all due to simply sleeping through this. Though the general question on everyone's mind was a simple one as the flash would end and their vision would return. "What was that?"

Confused, and looking over their equally baffled students, the teachers of the classrooms would do their best to quiet everyone down. Trying to continue the day as if it never happened. Though would be until the first of the tremors hit. A loud thud followed by the earth itself seeming to shift, It would be impossible for the students to remain in their seats as most were tossed to the ground. The panic returning in full effect as even the Teacher's began to question what was going on. Of course another tremor would shake the building followed by another shortly after. They rhythmic in fashion always seeming to hit about the same time apart. Though each would grow more and more intense. The classrooms on the North side of the building would have the most bearing on what was happening.

Although each window which was flocked too as a result, each and every person fighting to see if the view to the outside world could given them a hint to what was happening. Each view similar as they would all just see an endless expanse of brown in each direction. The souls of the North side of the building would at least be treated to a whole other view as the last of the tremors hit. The source becoming visible as a large black wall would seemingly crash down. Nearly tearing the building apart in just the sheer scale of the quakes it caused. Many windows shattered and ever a few of the floors gave out. Though who would remain in tact simply looked out trying to get any information on what was happening.

Into the distance, some ways down the "black wall" it could be made out, something written on it, something in white. It would take many of them to look intently, trying to study it, all eventually coming to the conclusion as they talked amongst themselves that it was lettering, human lettering. They would see that what it said however made no sense, just the two letters "DC" on the side, the letters intertwined. "T-The Shoe?" A young woman in one of the classes on the top floor would mutter to herself and her particular classroom. Many wouldn't be able to comprehend it, the idea but slowly it would begin to sink in. If that was a shoe, then the one wearing it would be enormous, bigger than any man made structures and they.....they were nothing. This building, if this "wall" which would simply be the side of the shoe, was any indication. The toe end of it could demolish their building three times over.

=============

"Where in the fuck?!" Trish would shout as she looked over the open expanse which was the dirt that the school used to occupy. It was impossible for her to believe that such a large building which housed that many students could just disappear. She would explore the dirt, looking for any clue that she could to what may of happened. Though it seemed to be a fruitless venture as she would come to a stop near the center point of the brown patch. Her shoe coming to rest near something that hadn't quite caught her attention yet. What did on the other hand was the gun she held in her grasp, the one she had taken off May. Quickly, she would look it over and immediately scoff at what she saw.

This gun was so cartoony, such a kid's toy. Even complete with the dials and switches. She almost couldn't be bothered to look on further. Though she would, and her eye's would harden a bit as she read the labels "Grow" and "Shrink" on it. She would laugh a bit in disbelief at how absurd it was, though....looking at the dirt patch, was it really? Shaking her head a bit, this left her with an option. May who was beginning to come too on the sidewalk was catching her attention once more, and she would get some damned answers!

Without a second glance at her prisoner, Marie tossed the tiny woman into her mouth, swallowing her immediately. The behemoth bully smiled wide, showing her now-vacant maw to the entire neighborhood to display her intent. "The little bitch was tastier than I thought," she mused, kneeling to the tiny houses below. "But I'm still hungry. And that's too bad for all you little fucks!"

The impact of her knees on the concrete was explosive, as bits of asphalt and displaced piping was strewn into the air. Anyone still brave enough to have remained in the titanic thug's presence would be thrown off their feet, left prone to her huge probing fingers. The giant girl scooped up pedestrians, cars, and even smaller houses and sheds into a humongous handful, which she eagerly shoveled into her cavernous mouth.

She repeated this action again and again, each heaping handful pulling up more and more of the suburban sprawl around her. Truth be told, it tasted rather poorly, mostly seeming flavorless to Maire's man-sized taste buds. But the taste was hardly the point. The sheer fact that she was devouring her old neighborhood, eating people she knew and buildings she'd lived in the shadows of her entire life... the raw display of power was a turn-on by itself.

And it was only the beginning.

When most of the homes and people within her reach had been consumed, the giantess stood again, unleashing a massive belch in the process.

Lunch was over, and so were the suburbs. Marie was ready to visit the city.

Shaking her prodigious ass a bit, she slid her hands down the side of her jeans, pulling them and her panties down her thighs, exposing her bare rump for the whole city to see.

Back outside Sara let out a little belch and smiled. She then kicked off her shoes and placed her feet on the table. Suddenly she heard another voice.

"Mommy mommy!" Sara's youngest daughter, "Mei" ((Again I think that was her name. I think the author of this story should really add some character bio's to make it less confusing.)) runs over to her!

"Hello dear! Whats the matter?" Sara asks.

"Umm....May had to go stay with your aunt. Shes going to be gone for a VERY long time. Im sorry but maybe I can take you later." Sara tells Mei while stroking her hair.

"Awww...I guess we can go to the mall later. Hey mommy I forgot to show you this!" Mei then pulls out the shrink gun from earlier! Sara gasps and quickly swipes it out of her hands!

"Where did you get this?!" Sara says in a high voice.

"I dont know! May gave it to me and..........Oh yeah thats right! May was really little and wanted me to unshrink her but I accidently made her smaller!" Mei tells her mom. Sara gasps as she remembers her dead little daughter!

"Mei....so you mean this "gun" shrunk May? In this house?" Sara asks. Mei nods her head up and down.

"Oh......well then.....we better be really careful then Mei......we dont accidently want to step her." Sara said.

"Oh........well I didnt actually SEE her leave. She was just supposed to leave earlier today. I'll have to call aunt Lucy and tell her May wont make it. May stood on Mei's Tangled bedsheets and continued to assess the situation; it was hard to believe she'd been in this room just last night; last night she'd barely been able to squeeze into the chairs around Mei's table where her plastic tea set sat now she was even smaller than the seats. Last night she'd carried Mei into this room, and now the roles were switched, and finally May's heart sank when she saw Mei's dollhouse. Last night she was happily playing dolls with her little sister, and now she could probably share clothes with Barbie.

May sighed as she fell onto Rapunzel's face, "what wrong May?" Mei inquired.

May groaned, "my little sister had to carry me in here, ten minutes ago my other sister tried to squish me like a bug, and now I have to spend the rest of my life as a munchkin, and you ask what's wrong?"

Mei began to tear up hurt, "no, Mei. I'm sorry," May apologized, "you're the only one whose been helping me, I'm just mad I can't grow back, but it's not your fault."

"What should we do now?" Mei asked.

14222112211.content:
"Mom's out with her friends, and she won't be back until late, so I'm in charge since May's up and disappeared," Miya told Mei, "and it's way past your bedtime Mei."

"You're lying!" Mei put the hand holding May close to her mouth and whispered, "right?"

May looked at the kitchen clock, and it was only half past five, and Mei's bedtime wasn't until eight, "yeah, she's lying big time, it's only five thirty."

"It's only five birdies!" Mei argued.

May chuckled, "five thirty," she corrected.

"Five thirty!" Mei repeated.

"Since when can you tell time?" Miya demanded.

Mei grinned, "my big sister helped me."

May smiled, it was nice to know that despite the fact that Mei was holding May in her hand she still thought of May as her big sister.

Miya groaned, "when I find May she's dead, okay fine, go get ready; dinner's in one hour."

"Okay," Mei walked out of the kitchen and made sure Miya was preoccupied before she started talking to May again. "What we do now?"

"Well with mom gone we don't have a lot of options left," May told her sister.

"Should I show you to Miya?" Mei inquired.

May shook her head, "No, no, no, she thought I was a bug earlier and tried squishing me, besides she's irresponsible she'd probably just leave me somewhere and end up killing me later thinking I was a fly."

"What irresponsible?" Mei asked.

"Being irresponsible means, you forget your chores or forget to feed your dog," May explained.

"Am I irresponsible?" Mei inquired.

"No way," May answered, "you've been doing everything you can to help me, kept me safe, tried to find mom for me sure, and even made sure you were carrying me right. You've got to be the most responsible five-year-old girl in the world."

Mei smiled, "Thank you May."

"It's the truth Kiddo," May went on, "in fact if you ask me you should be the one babysitting Miya.”

Mei giggled, “That’d be funny.”

“You know, if the gun was working we could totally make Miya the size of one of your baby dolls,” May grinned.

Now Mei was straight up laughing, “she’d be a naughty baby.”

“Yeah,” May agreed, “she’d probably throw her food all over the walls.”

Mei stopped laughing after a minute, “Sorry gun broken.”

May sighed, “it’s okay, maybe I could get used to this.”

“Where you get that gun anyway?” Mei inquired.

“Oh, it came in the mail,” May answered when suddenly a thought occurred to her, “wait, the mail! It came in a package, and it had an instruction manual I bet one can tell us where the shrink ray was made!”

Mei smiled as well, “you’re right, where are they?”

“I left the manual on the hall counter, and I bet the packaging is in the kitchen recycle, we have to go get them before Miya finds them,” May told Mei.

“Then we better go, you’re a genius May,” Mei noted as she took her sister to the hall.

“Hey, you gave me the idea,” May responded, “we make an excellent team.”

Mei walked into the hall and found a small piece of paper, “This it?” she asked.

“It is,” May answered, “but how do we get Miya out of the kitchen?”

“We could get it later,” Mei offered.

May thought about that and decided…

1422211221113.content:
“I think we need to get that packaging as soon as possible,” May decided.

“Well,” Mei said nervously, “I think I know how to get Miya out of the kitchen.”

“Great,” May remarked, “how?”

Mei didn't answer, she merely ran to the front door and went outside, it took Mei a few tries, but she managed to ring the doorbell several times and run back inside. “Yeah, yeah,” Miya shouted from the other room, Miya walked across the hall and opened the door, “what do you want?” Miya asked obviously not finding anyone there. “Hello?” Miya asked as she ventured just outside the door and as she did Mei quickly ran behind her and locked her out of the house. “Hey!” Miya called.

“Woah Mei,” May remarked as her sister carried her into the kitchen, “I owe you big time.”

Mei quickly began digging through the kitchen recycle, and after a few minutes she pulled out a square package, “That’s it!” May remarked. Mei quickly removed all evidence that she’d been in the kitchen before picking up May and the package and running to her room. Unfourtanetley, as she ran past the front door Miya saw her.

“You little brat,” Miya shouted, “when I get in there you are so dead!”

Mei took everything to her room; she hid the instruction manual and packaging under her floor, put May on her nightstand, and went to her door taking a deep breath.

“Mei?” May inquired, “is something wrong?”

“When Miya comes in here you should hide,” Mei remarked.

May noticed how Mei had said when Miya comes in, from the nightstand May could hear what was going on in the hall.

“That was so not funny Mei!”

“It was just a joke, Miya.”

“Come here!”

“Miya, please!”

May heard Mei crying along with several hard slaps to bare skin,

“This’ll teach you to play jokes on me!”

“Ow, ow, ow, ow!”

It tore May apart that Mei was suffering through this because of her, it went on for what felt like hours until Miya carried a whimpering Mei into the room and threw her on the bed, “and no dinner either!” Miya quickly slammed the door.

May looked on in horror at Mei; her dress was flipped up, her panties were around her ankles, her bottom was as red as a fresh lobster, and she was sobbing miserably. “Mei,” May called, “what the Hell happened?” Mei didn't respond, so May had to jump onto the bed. “Mei,” May said as she put a hand on her sobbing sister’s giant face. “I’m so sorry; this is all my fault.”

Eventually, Mei stopped crying, “we should check the packaging,” she said.

“Are you okay?” May asked.

"Whats wrong? Afraid of my big stinky feet? I thought you liked them?" Miya laughed. She then reached down and picked Andrew up by the collar of his shirt. She then held him over the opening of her boot and dropped him in. He hit the insole hard, but not hard enough to seriously injure him. The horrid scent of leather and sweat filled his lungs as he stood up and checked his surroundings. It was so dark he could barely see anything inside Miya's boot. The only thing he could see was the size label he was standing on. It read 7 1/2.

"Better run little man because here comes my foot!" Miya then held her foot over the boot and prepared to slide it in! Andrew screamed and ran to the toe end as fast as he could....
144221211222.title: In the boot

choices: Miya's on cloud nine, she goes to find another unlucky soul
14422122.content:
Jenny couldn't keep her footing on Miya's saliva-soaked tongue. In addition, it was moving around to sample Jenny's flavor; and there are over two thousand taste buds on the tongue! Jenny could hear, actually VERY loudly, Miya moaning with pleasure. She opened her mouth a crack to give Jenny a last look at the world, which was very cruel to allow this to happen to her. Once it closed once more, one of the incisors caught Jenny's pant leg. She breathed a sigh of relief when seeing how close the tooth came to mutilating her leg. Raising up again, Jenny was moved a bit to the right. She widened her eyes, and tried to get away. Before she could, however, the tooth came down again, and this time it punctured her leg, but didn't go all the way through; Jenny had a lot of muscle. But that didn't stop the immense pain, or the blood from spraying out. Another ear-splitting moan of pleasure was heard from Miya. She looked down at her leg, and saw a bloody tooth; the other end of the leg was caught under the tooth. Then the incisor raised again, and Jenny let out a scream when she saw that part of her leg was caught on the corner of the tooth! As it raised, Jenny raised with it, and hung face down over the bottom teeth. Jenny covered her eyes, and cried.

Miya heard this, and smiled.

As the tooth came down, as expected, Jenny was crushed.

Miya then swished Jenny around a bit. Different parts of her body broke off, releasing more blood. Miya reflected on the taste; it didn't taste that good, too much iron.

After swishing around for a couple more seconds, she swallowed. Well, Miya thought, she'll be considerably uglier the next time I see her!
14422122.title: chew her up first

144222.content:
Miya's face turns sour as she begins to crush her sisters body between her mighty jaws. The taste of her raw flesh was a bit unusual to Miya at first. However once her taste buds adapted to the flavor, Miya's expression immediatly turned into a smile.

"Mmmm mmmmmm..." She moaned as she swallowed her remains and burped.

"That was...Tasty...." Miya said and went to the fridge to grab a can of soda. Miya cracked it open and took a sip, wondering who else she could shrink with her new toy. Miya gets the perfect idea and decides to,

"Sorry Cindy, but I think that I've outgrown you!"
1442221.content:
Miya decides to have some fun by shrinking one of her friends. She picks up the phone and calls her friend, Cindy. Cindy answered the phone quickly.

"Hey Miya, what's up?"

"Hey Cindy! I have something awesome that I want to show you! Whatever your doing, drop it and come over here, okay?"

She then hung up before Cindy could say another word. Minutes later, Miya heard a knock on the door. That was her cue! She grabbed the shrink ray, opened the door, and zapped Cindy with it! Cindy was reduced to a meager 3 inches tall, and was immediately scooped up by Miya.

"Hi Cindy, how do you like the surprise?"

Cindy was panicking now.

"W-what did you do to me, Miya?!"

"Why, I shrunk you, silly!"

"I can see that, but why?!"

"Because I thought it would be fun! You know, I already ate my big sister earlier..."

Now Cindy was petrified. Was she going to be eaten by her best friend?!

"Please don't hurt me, Miya! I'm your best friend! Please! I'm too young to be eaten!"


How will Miya respond?
1442221.title: Shrunken Cindy

she then picks up the tiny May and walks over to her dirtiest pair of Flip Flops and drops her on the sole of them, May hits the sole of them and the stench of Miya's foot sweat covers her and a moist feeling hits her aswell from the sweta in the soles,May quickly looks up to see......

The simple beads of sweat still on the Flip Flop which were unnoticeable to even May were now Lakes that surrounded her in each direction

The odor only got worse making May gag from the stench. She had finally stopped shrinking and the lakes where now HUGE!. The plain of the Flipflop she was on went on as far as she could see and that was just the toe section.

14511.content:
"OH NO!!" May screamed out in terror as Miya's huge sole began to lower into the flip-flop! There was nothing May could do. She just grabbed her hair and dropped to her knees. Never in her wildest dreams did she think that she'd die underneath her own sisters foot! Everything got darker and darker as Miya's sole entered the flip-flop. The last thing May heard was a loud rumble followed by a smacking noise before everything went silent. Miya looked down at her flip-flops and playfully wiggled her toes inside of them.

"Well May. Looks like you're not the big girl anymore. Thanks for the neat toy tho. Im going to enjoy getting my revenge on the people I hate hehe. Well i'd better go. The mall awaits for me and my friends!" Miya said then happily skips out the door. Poor May was never heard from again. Miya's natural foot sweat broke May's crushed body down and made her a permanent stain inside of her flip-flops forever.

choices: She only grows into an Amazon, seven to ten feet
She goes all out, dwarfing Godzilla
14512.content:
With her sister out of the way, Miya was ready to put this amazing device to its proper use. Miya was always a spoiled, angry girl, looking for any opportunity to force others to do her bidding. Unfortunately, she was also a small girl, totally lacking any ability to back up her desires.

But this device could certainly change that. She could shrink anyone she desired to nothing, and finally unleash her anger on those who deserved it. Her sister was only the beginning...

Happily heading out the front door, Miya recognized something on the gun; a simple switch that flipped from "Negative" to "Positive". It was already set to "Negative", and that made people shrink to nothing. Miya was a smart girl, and she instantly understood the implications.

Why bother shrinking people to prove her power, when she could instead make herself bigger than anyone?

Flipping the switch, she fired upon herself.
14512.title: Bigger Bully

she instantly grew to a hulking seven feet. Miya felt totally power full and May felt helpless. Miya looked down at her flip-flop and her sister. how's the weather down there big sister? After a big flash Miya the short "tall" giantess was standing above her sister. "you know, i just got anew insole and i think i'm going to try it out Miya said looking down at her sister





Will she...?

Miya must have been 100 feet tall, and still growing! Miya grew and grew as an evil smile crept across her face. May could not believe how large Miya was getting. She must have been 300 feet tall by now! Then 400, 500, 600, 700, 800, 900, 1000, then a huge jump to 5000 feet tall, still she grew! Then she finally stopped growing. She must have been 10,000 feet tall! "OOOOOH! I'M A REALLY BIG GIRL NOW!" Miya said in a booming voice. she bent all the way over, but she couldn't see her little-big sister. But she did see the gun. when she touched it, it grew to a comfortable size for her to use! Miya wanted to shrink her sister more, but she also wanted to show off. What should she do?

info.brief_description: a girl gets a gun that shrinks people ((Public again))
info.description:
An 18 year old asian girl named May gets a package that contains a strange weapon that can shrink things! How does she plan on using it?


First off, I would like to thank all of those who have contributed to my story thru-out the years. Unfortunately, I have gotten an outstanding amount of messages from other users stating that the story contained too much underage sexual and gross content. Which is why I made this private so I could clean things up a bit. I have decided to enforce a few simple rules now and hopefully this will make the story even better!


1. Sexual interaction with minors is not allowed. Sorry but it is against the law and I personally dont find it to my liking either. This doesn't mean you cant interact with under 18 characters anymore. Just as long as sex isnt involved :)

2. No toilet\fart stuff. This was the number one reason why I started getting so many complaints on my story. So im going to have to tell you to please refrain from adding such content. Hope this doesnt offend anyone else but there are a lot of other interactive stories here that allow this kind of content.

3. Try to stay more consistent. If May is wearing sandals in one chapter, she obviously wont magically be barefoot or wearing sneakers in the next.



Again sorry about all the inconvenience. Hope these changes wont bother you and you'll continue to help make this story grow!
